nodes.text: The narvaxx was a four-legged non-sentient species living in the galaxy. Several captured narvaxx were used by Doctor Sannus Lorrick in his experiments wtih the rakghoul plague in his base on Ord Mantell. A giant infected narvaxx called Toxxun was spotted during the rakghoul pandemic in the Coronet City on Corellia.

Narvaxx were created for Star Wars: The Old Republic. Content in game files indicated that narvaxx were intended to appear as the wildlife on Denova and also provide a depiction of an unaltered narvaxx. The only narvaxx who appear in the actual game are infected with the rakghoul plague, during the "Lost Island" flashpoint and as a Rakghoul Event World Boss on Corellia.
